overview:
Susan Nia is the President of SNIA Interactive Marketing. With more than 18 years of direct to consumer marketing experience, Susan Nia provides clients a unique blend of brand and direct to consumer global marketing skills with a special focus on customer acquisition and retention leveraging direct response, social media, web-based and mobile marketing.

Nia creates turn-key campaigns designed to elicit higher ROI, brand awareness and mass market distribution. Nia’s clients include LeapFrog Enterprises, Razor U.S.A., Creativity, Inc., Disney and Star Wars licensees, and Ohio Art to name a few.

Nia has held senior management positions with powerhouse companies including Vivendi Universal US & Europe Kids Division, Symantec’s Quarterdeck Division, IAC’s Citysearch.com, Mobinex’s (Fix8) US & Asia Division and Williams Worldwide Advertising Agency. Additionally, she ran the in-house direct response agency of Primex Talking Yellow Pages, the leading DRTV daytime advertiser of its time.

Nia served on the initial committee that established the COPPA (Children Online Privacy Practices Act) and is tapped regularly by the Toy Industry Association to speak on cost effective ways to market products utilizing online and DRTV advertising.
